snippet: The great horned owl population across all the boroughs is slowly expanding, and two pairs have raised hopes in two boroughs where they are most rare.
abstract: The great horned owl population across all the boroughs is slowly expanding, and two pairs have raised hopes in two boroughs where they are most rare.
lead_paragraph: If owls represent wisdom, as folklore dictates, then perhaps Brooklyn and Manhattan are no place for sages.

headline.main: In Brooklyn and Manhattan, Owl Watchers May Have Their Day
